amendment.description: Amendment prohibits the use of funds for various international energy programs in China, India, Kazakhstan and Mexico.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 53 printed in the Congressional Record to prohibit the use of funds for any portion of the International program activities at the Office of Energy Efficiency and Renewable Energy of the Department of Energy with the exception of the activities authorized in section 917 of the Energy Independence and Security Act of 2007 (42 U.S.C. 17337).

vote.text: On agreeing to the Harris amendment (A072) Agreed to by recorded vote: 236 - 185 (Roll no. 596).
